creator: salevin@lgc.com
text:
The current ant script does not recognize the Microsoft Subsystem for Unix-like Applications (SUA), a Unix on Windows environment under which uname reports "Interix".  That environment is very similar to cygwin with the exception that "cygpath" is replaced by "unixpath2win" as the utility for transforming filenames or colon-separated path variables to MS Windows format. (unixpath2win does gratuitously convert "*" to "?".)

Our company policy makes it rather difficult for me and fellow employees to contribute actual code for such an enhancement, but I would be happy to review or test any upgrades along those lines.  In the meantime, I can continue to support the upgrade locally.
